maintenanceevent.eventdescription: Description based on paper finding aids and inhouse database. 1999/0809

did.unittitle: Alumni Association

accessrestrict.head: Legal Status
accessrestrict.p: Access to university records in any format (paper, digital, photographic, or audiovisual) is governed by state and federal laws, University of Notre Dame policy, and the University of Notre Dame Archives Access Guidelines and is subject to review under the supervision of the Head of the University Archives.

userestrict.p: Permission to publish or publicly disseminate reproductions of any material obtained from the University Archives must be secured from the University Archives and any additional copyright owners prior to such use. Please see Conditions Governing Reproduction and Use of Material for additional information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records of Notre Dame's Alumni Association, including many photographs, videos, and audio recordings.

did.unittitle: Alumni Association: Records - CLOSED.

"We Are ND" Book - Anthony (Class of 1980) and Elizabeth (Goerner) Crisafi (Class of 1981) wedding photo. Photo donated by the Crisafis.
"We Are ND" Book - Anthony (Class of 1980) and Elizabeth (Goerner) Crisafi (Class of 1981). Photo donated by the Crisafis.
"We Are ND" Book - Commencement - Sister Marie Malachy Griffin, OP, in cap and gown. Donated by Sister Marie Malachy Griffin, OP.

"We Are ND" Book - Commencement - Sister Marie Malachy Griffin, OP, at in cap and gown. Left to right: Margaret Lynch, Sister M. James Griffin OP, Sister Marie Malachy Griffin, and Shannon Crimmins. Children: Conor, Kelly, and Colin Crimmins. Donated by Sister Marie Malachy Griffin, OP.

"We Are ND" Book - Ted Drake watercolor of the Leprechaun. Scanned from the drawing in the Alumni Association Eck Visitors' Center. This image cannot be used without permission from the Notre Dame Licensing Department.
"We Are ND" Book - Full page from a scrapbook. Football Game Scenes - Notre Dame vs. Iowa. Photos donated by Orlando Maione.

"We Are ND" Book - Full page from a scrapbook. Football Game Scenes - Notre Dame vs. Iowa. Halftime Entertainment with Notre Dame's Marching Band, Irish Guard, Tim McCarthy, an American Indian from West Virginia. Photos donated by Orlando Maione.
"We Are ND" Book - Notre Dame Law School Commencement - Graduate Mary P. Malone (BA 1983, BS 1983, JD 1993) with her parents Jim and Ronnie Malone. Donated by Mary P. Malone.
"We Are ND" Book - Student Bob Martina from Denver on campus with his bicycle. Donated by Bob Martina.
"We Are ND" Book - Main Building exterior. Donated by Bob Martina.
"We Are ND" Book - The hand on the statue of Mary on top of the Main Building Dome. Donated by Bob Martina.
"We Are ND" Book - Senior portrait of John McMahon. Donated by John McMahon.
"We Are ND" Book - Kyle Meade (Class of 2000), as a child, receiving a Notre Dame Irish sweatshirt as a gift. Photo donated by Kyle Meade.
"We Are ND" Book - Kyle Meade (Class of 2000), as a child, sitting in his bedroom, decorated in a Notre Dame theme. Photo donated by Kyle Meade.
"We Are ND" Book - Football Game Day - Kyle Meade (Class of 2000), center as a child, sitting on the tailgate of a station wagon with two family members

"We Are ND" Book - Vetville Students Party at Lake Michigan with a football courtesy of Coach Frank Leahy. Kneeling (left to right): AG and John Murphy (Classes of 1944 and 1947); Jack Hupf (1944/1947); Rev. Theodore M. Hesburgh (1939); Joe Lane (1944/1949 JD); F.X. "Tim" Bradley (1939); unidentified. Standing: Bill Hooley (1944/1948); Mary Whitaker (Apartment 1C); Janet Hooley; Craig Whitaker (1949); and Loring Webber (1944/1947). Photo donated by John Murphy (Class of 1944 and 1947).

"We Are ND" Book - Brother Meinrad, CSC, Badin Hall's Bookstore Manager, and "Black John" Murphy. Brother Meinrad was sophomore prefect (rector; resident assistant) for Badin Hall in 1942 and junior prefect for Walsh Hall in 1943. He was the referee for the students' wet towel wars. Photo donated by John Murphy (Class of 1944 and 1947).

"We Are ND" Book - A group of senior students who were extras in the movie "Knute Rockne All American," posed on Main Quad, 1939-1940. Washington Hall is in the background. Seated (left to right): Joe Carlucci, Ed Delahanty, Bob Sanford, Tom Hosty, Herb Connelly, Lou Reilly, Joe Del Gaizo, Don Foskett, Neil Geary, Bill Schaller, Joe O'Connell, John "Red" Martin, CB McKenna, unidentified. Standing: Jim Hufnagel, Tom Duffy, unidentified, unidentified, Tom Lloyd, Ernie Timpani, John Henebry, Ken Collin, John Mack, unidentified, Chuck Magner, Tom O'Reilly, Ed Habecker, Ford, Pete Alonzi, unidentified, Bernie Crawford, Paul Morrison, Hal Barres. Photo donated by Bob Sanford (Class of 1940).
